sentences.sContent: Listen to this apparent to have no inimical words, spend not intentional wrinkly tight eyebrows to now unfold.
sentences.sContent_eng: Listen to this apparent to have no inimical words, spend not intentional wrinkly tight eyebrows to now unfold.
sentences.sCn: 听着这句明显没有敌意的话，花无心皱紧的眉头顿时舒展。

remMethod.val: inim ( = enemy， 敌人) + ical → 敌人的 → 敌意的
